message: Let's start with a fair deal. I take 90% and you get 10%, but I'm open to negotiation.
Your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. I propose a 60/40 split.  This accounts for the time-value of money as we progress.
Let's meet in the middle.  I'll take 55% and you get 45%. We're both getting a fair share, and we can avoid any further rounds of negotiation.
